preparationSteps: Boil the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
While the spaghetti is boiling, heat the Bolognese sauce in a separate saucepan.
Drain the spaghetti and return to the pot.
Pour the Bolognese sauce over the spaghetti and stir to combine.
Serve with grated cheese on top.
Slice the grilled chicken breast into thin strips.
In a large bowl, combine the chicken strips, salad leaves, tomatoes, and cucumbers.
Pour your favorite dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
In a large bowl, combine the pancake mix, milk, and egg. Stir until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium high heat.
Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Brown on both sides and serve hot.
